effect_entries.effect: Averages the user's unmodified Defense with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect_entries.short_effect: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user employs its psychic power to
average its Defense and Sp. Def stats
with those of its target’s.
